name: Forget (SnekySpider)
description:
Forget is a game where you navigate through dark and creepy mazes trying to avoid any possible threat. The first few levels of the game will make you feel like the game is just an eerie maze. 2 level(s) are currently built, but only 1 is available as of version alpha 0.10. The game developed is in spare time though updated come out regularly. I do not want donations so they are turned off.

Please leave feedback it is much appreciated, this is my first Unity game and all feedback is helpful.
